penalty_details: Possession: Up to 10 years imprisonment or $20,000 fine or both. Consumption: At least 1 year to 10 years imprisonment with a maximum fine of $20,000. Illegal traffic: At least 5 years to 20 years imprisonment and 5 to 15 strokes of the cane. Illegal import/export: At least 5 years to 30 years imprisonment and 5 to 15 strokes of the cane.

Possession/consumption: Up to 10 years imprisonment or $20,000 fine or both. Illegal traffic: At least 5 years to 20 years imprisonment and 5 to 15 strokes of the cane. Illegal import/export: At least 5 years to 30 years imprisonment and 5 to 15 strokes of the cane.

Possession: Less than 330g - Up to 10 years or $20,000 fine; 330g-500g - At least 10 years and 5 strokes of the cane; More than 500g - At least 20 years and 10 strokes of the cane. Consumption: At least 1 year to 10 years imprisonment with a maximum fine of $20,000. Illegal traffic: Less than 330g - At least 5 years and 5 strokes; More than 500g - May face the death penalty.

Possession: Less than 20g - Up to 10 years or $20,000 fine; 20g-30g - At least 10 years and 5 strokes; More than 30g - At least 20 years and 10 strokes. Consumption: At least 1 year to 10 years imprisonment with a maximum fine of $20,000. Illegal traffic: Less than 20g - At least 5 years and 5 strokes; More than 30g - May face the death penalty.

Possession: Up to 10 years or $20,000 fine. Consumption: At least 1 year to 10 years imprisonment with a maximum fine of $20,000. Illegal traffic: At least 5 years to 20 years imprisonment and 5 to 15 strokes of the cane. Illegal import/export: At least 5 years to 30 years imprisonment and 5 to 15 strokes of the cane.

Possession: Less than 10g - Up to 10 years or $20,000 fine; 10g-15g - At least 10 years and 5 strokes; More than 15g - At least 20 years and 10 strokes. Consumption: At least 1 year to 10 years imprisonment with a maximum fine of $20,000. Illegal traffic: Less than 10g - At least 5 years and 5 strokes; More than 15g - May face the death penalty.
Selling or offering to sell an intoxicating substance suspected for intoxication: Up to 2 years of imprisonment with a maximum fine of $5,000.

Possession: Up to 10 years or $20,000 fine. Consumption: At least 1 year to 10 years imprisonment with a maximum fine of $20,000. Illegal traffic: At least 5 years to 20 years imprisonment and 5 to 15 strokes of the cane. Illegal import/export: At least 5 years to 30 years imprisonment and 5 to 15 strokes of the cane.

Possession: Up to 10 years or $20,000 fine. Consumption: At least 1 year to 10 years imprisonment with a maximum fine of $20,000. Trafficking: At least 5 years to 20 years imprisonment and 5 to 15 strokes of the cane. Import/export: At least 5 years to 30 years imprisonment and 5 to 15 strokes of the cane.

Possession: Up to 10 years or $20,000 fine. Consumption: At least 1 year to 10 years imprisonment with a maximum fine of $20,000. Illegal traffic: Up to 20 years imprisonment and 15 strokes of the cane. Illegal import/export: At least 5 years to 20 years imprisonment and 5 to 15 strokes of the cane.

Possession/consumption: Up to 10 years or $20,000 fine or both. Illegal traffic: At least 5 years to 20 years imprisonment and 5 to 15 strokes of the cane. Illegal import/export: At least 5 years to 30 years imprisonment and 5 to 15 strokes of the cane.

Possession: Less than 167g - Up to 10 years or $20,000 fine; 167g-250g - At least 10 years and 5 strokes; More than 250g - At least 20 years and 10 strokes. Consumption: At least 1 year to 10 years imprisonment with a maximum fine of $20,000. Illegal traffic: Less than 167g - At least 5 years and 5 strokes; More than 250g - May face the death penalty.

Possession: Up to 10 years or $20,000 fine. Consumption: At least 1 year to 10 years imprisonment with a maximum fine of $20,000. Illegal traffic: At least 5 years to 20 years imprisonment and 5 to 15 strokes of the cane. Illegal import/export: At least 5 years to 30 years imprisonment and 5 to 15 strokes of the cane.

Possession: Up to 10 years or $20,000 fine. Consumption: At least 1 year to 10 years imprisonment with a maximum fine of $20,000. Illegal traffic: At least 2 years to 10 years imprisonment and 2 to 5 strokes of the cane. Illegal import/export: At least 3 years to 20 years imprisonment and 5 to 15 strokes of the cane.
